type.description: Type of event this record describes

bounce_class.description: Classification code for a given message (see [Bounce Classification Codes](https://support.sparkpost.com/customer/portal/articles/1929896))

campaign_id.description: Campaign of which this message was a part

customer_id.description: SparkPost-customer identifier through which this message was sent

delv_method.description: Protocol by which SparkPost delivered this message

device_token.description: Token of the device / application targeted by this PUSH notification message. Applies only when delv_method is gcm or apn.

error_code.description: Error code by which the remote server described a failed delivery attempt

friendly_from.description: Friendly sender or "From" header in the original email

ip_address.description: IP address of the host to which SparkPost delivered this message; in engagement events, the IP address of the host where the HTTP request originated

ip_pool.description: IP pool through which this message was sent

message_id.description: SparkPost-cluster-wide unique identifier for this message

msg_from.description: Sender address used on this message's SMTP envelope

num_retries.description: Number of failed attempts before this message was successfully delivered; when the first attempt succeeds, zero

rcpt_tags.description: Tags applied to the message which generated this event

rcpt_to.description: Lowercase version of recipient address used on this message's SMTP envelope

raw_rcpt_to.description: Actual recipient address used on this message's SMTP envelope

rcpt_type.description: Indicates that a recipient address appeared in the Cc or Bcc header or the archive JSON array

raw_reason.description: Unmodified, exact response returned by the remote server due to a failed delivery attempt
raw_reason.sampleValue: MAIL REFUSED - IP (17.99.99.99) is in black list

reason.description: Canonicalized text of the response returned by the remote server due to a failed delivery attempt
reason.sampleValue: MAIL REFUSED - IP (a.b.c.d) is in black list

sending_ip.description: IP address through which this message was sent

sms_coding.description: Data encoding used in the SMS message

sms_dst_ton.description: Type of number for the destination address

sms_src_ton.description: Type of number for the source address

subject.description: Subject line from the email header

template_id.description: Slug of the template used to construct this message

template_version.description: Version of the template used to construct this message

timestamp.description: Event date and time, in Unix timestamp format (integer seconds since 00:00:00 GMT 1970-01-01)

relay_permfail.description: Relayed message has reached the maximum retry threshold and will be removed from the system.

relay_event.description: Relay events describe the life cycle of an inbound message including injection, delivery, and disposition.
